Let’s confront the truth. Many middle-class Americans are living paycheck to paycheck, even as the costs of health care, tuition, and housing have soared. We need to build an economy that gives dignity and decency to American workers.

In America today, a person can walk into a pharmacy and find that the medicine they have used for years has doubled, tripled, or quadrupled literally overnight. THAT is a true crisis.

https://www.wsj.com/articles/drugmakers-raise-prices-on-hundreds-of-medicines-11546389293
